content: pattern comes with a free step-by-step video tutorial 1 **skill level** advanced beginner *if you know how to knit and purl you can make this especially with the accompanying video tutorial * **sizing** 21 5 54 5 cm around by 8 5 21 5 cm tall the circumference is customizable **yarn** super bulky #6 105 yards 96 meters *sample uses big twist natural blend 80% wool 20% acrylic - 105 yards 96 m /142g in blush mix i used just under 1 full ball about 101 yards rounded up for the yardage estimate * **other materials** * cable needle or double pointed needle dpn of the same or similar size * yarn needle * optional removable stitch markers **needles** us 13 9 00 mm needles *or size needed to match gauge * **gauge** stockinette - worked flat 9 5 sts / 15 row = 4″ 10 cm 1 https //youtu be/heuzctakh9s
